item.title: Yosemite Valley, CA - October 8, 2015
item.author: Scott Tactical
item.description:
Hiking and Photography - Yosemite National Park

In one of the world’s most Beautiful National Parks

Yosemite National Park - nps.gov

 

 

The first full day of hiking and taking pictures in Yosemite. We realized that we weren’t going to get a spot for the second day so we decided to save our energy on the valley floor and walk around taking photos. Most of the animals were amazingly friendly. The weather was absolutely amazing as well.

My advice is to book well in advance. Scout out the campsites by google maps if you can and get a good spot. That makes the trip so much better.

item.title: Photography Sepulveda Dam and WildLife Basin - Los Angeles
item.author: Scott Tactical
item.description:
Taking Pictures at the Sepulveda Dam

Did a little scouting and shooting photography yesterday morning.

Just a couple highlights.Â  I am of course shooting with my Canon EOS 60D

 

Sepulveda Dam

The fog was enough all by itself. I wished I could have stuck around for more of that. I will come back just for the morning fog and do a timelapse at some point. </P
